short_summary: Services of Two Geomatics Analysts to support the North Atlantic Right Whale protection measures
description: This is a Request for Proposal to obtain the services of two (2) Geomatics Analysts (Level 1) ...
full_summary:
**Notice of Tender:**
# **Services Contract for Two Geomatics Analysts to Support NARW Protection Measures**
- **Tender Reference:** CB-274-79655154
- **Tender Number:** T8080-230636
- **Notice Date:** November 20, 2024
- **Closing Date:** December 5, 2024
- **Time:** 12:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

## Description:
Transport Canada seeks the services of two Geomatics Analysts to support North Atlantic Right Whale (NARW) protection measures. The analysts will perform tasks such as data digitization, cartographic support, and develop web-based dashboards. This project aims to reduce human impacts on the NARW population through evidence-based speed and traffic monitoring profiles.

## Procurement Details:
- **Procurement Category:** Service
- **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- **Region(s) of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada
- **Contracting Entity:** Transport Canada
- **Contracting Address:** 330 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0N5, Canada

## RFP Information:
- **Contact Name:** Tania Cantin
- **Contact Email:** [tania.cantin@tc.gc.ca](mailto:tania.cantin@tc.gc.ca)
- **Contact Phone Number:** (613) 447-7499
- **Notice URL:**

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52209/t8080-230636---npp\_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52209/t8080-230636---npp\_en.pdf)

or

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52209/t8080-230636---apm\_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52209/t8080-230636---apm\_fr.pdf)

## Additional Information:
